template

template: string = `<ul><li ng-if="pages.length>options.gap"><a href="" ng-click="firstPage()" class="first" ng-bind-html="svgPagerToStart" ng-class="{disabled: options.page == 1}"></a></li><li ng-if="pages.length>0"><a href="" ng-click="prevPage()" class="prev" ng-bind-html="svgPagerBackward" ng-class="{disabled: options.page == 1}"></a></li><li ng-repeat="page in pages | startFrom: startPage | limitTo: options.gap"ng-class="{active: page === options.page}"><a href="" ng-click="setPage(page)" class="page">{{page}}</a></li><li ng-if="pages.length>0"><a href="" ng-click="nextPage()" class="next" ng-bind-html="svgPagerForward" ng-class="{disabled: options.page == pages.length}"></a></li><li ng-if="pages.length>options.gap"><a href="" ng-click="lastPage()" class="last" ng-bind-html="svgPagerToEnd" ng-class="{disabled: options.page == pages.length}"></a></li></ul>`
